content.question: In context, the discussion of “owehzhee” in the second paragraph suggests that the narrator

choices.label: sees an attractive appearance as the best way to resist authority
believes that Shamengwa is vain because he practices “owehzhee”
understands and sympathizes with Shamengwa’s attentiveness to his appearance
shares Shamengwa’s focus on keeping a youthful appearance

content.answer: understands and sympathizes with Shamengwa’s attentiveness to his appearance

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe the narrator or speaker of a text.
